Translations.Text: tini ka'uke janma denani ebam ke'u take janma deyani
Baluna, ami asraya grahana karachi prabhatera palanakartara
tini ya srsti karechena, tara anista theke
andhakara ratrira anista theke, yakhana ta samagata haya
granthite phumtkara diye jadukarinidera anista theke
ebam hinsukera anista theke yakhana se hinsa kare.
Baluna, ami asraya grahana karitechi manusera palanakartara
tara anista theke, ye kumantrana deya o atnagopana kare
jbinera madhya theke athaba manusera madhya theke.
